page.title: 16HEALTH IN TRELAWNYD
page.content: A great cause of dissatiscation amongst the residents is that the nearest Doctors surgery is held in Dyserth. The elderly people find it difficult to attend,especially since the near demise of the public transport system.They are also unhappy about the lack of provision with the village for the dispensing of prescriptions.Many voiced their views that they would like to see the re_instatement of a regular surgery in the village.The O.A.P. bungalows are supervised by a Warden who assists the residents with their health promblems.The nearest Dentist or Natal Clinic is held at the Health Clinic in prestatyn.A Chiropodist makes regular weekly visits to Dyserth.Emergency cases,requiring hospital attention,have to go to the hospital at Bodelwyddan.
